mdRecord.dcterms:description: one of a series of commissions that architect Louis Sullivan took on late in his career. These commissions resulted in a collection of bank buildings that have been termed "jewel boxes" for their modest size and ornate appearance. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/People's_Federal_Savings_and_Loan_Association [work]
